elements.title: What is meant by the term "source of supply"?
elements.correctAnswer: Places where retailers can procure their goods

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Which retail functions do you know?
elements.correctAnswer: Assortment function, transport function, warehouse function, quantity function, advisory function, credit function, risk function
